In England, in the seven days to 18 April, there were 13,782 new confirmed cases (24.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 April, there were 16,238 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 15% (2,456 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 April is 3,845,537 (6,832 cases per 100,000 population).
